dc_title_s: Michigan territory; drawn by J. Finlayson; Engrav'd by Young & Delleker.; Geographical, statistical, and historical map of Michigan Territory.
dc_description_s: Shows portions of Wisconsin, Illinois, Indiana, Ohio, and Ontario. Relief shown by hachures. Text in side panels includes information about the situation and boundaries of Michigan, climate, population, commerce, government, and a brief historical sketch. "No. 36." From: A complete historical, chronological, and geographical American atlas ... / H.C. Carey and I. Lea, 1822. 1 map: hand col.; 36 x 26 cm, on sheet 45 x 57 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Finlayson, J. (James),Dahl, James, former owner.,Young & Delleker.,Carey & Lea. A Complete historical, chronological and geographical American atlas.
